main_definition: Surfing is the act of riding waves while standing or lying prone on a surfboard.

meanings_and_examples.example: He was spending all day surfing the internet for information.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having fun or enjoying oneself in a carefree manner
meanings_and_examples.example: After finishing her work, she went out to surf with friends and enjoyed herself thoroughly.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The act of riding ocean waves while standing on a specially designed board
meanings_and_examples.example: They spent the entire day at the beach, catching waves and enjoying themselves as they surfed in the Pacific Ocean.
